name: Custom Thank You Page Per Product for WC
author: Saad Qureshi

sections.description: Free WC extension that enable to assign custom thank you page to any product specifically you also can link to other WordPress pages and even a custom link or URL.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 4.2 or greater
  • PHP version 5.2.4 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater
  • WooCommerce 2.4.0 or greater

The quickest method for installing the Plugin is:

  1. Visit Plugins -> Add Search “WooCommerce Custom Thank You Page”
  2. Click on the Custom Thank You Page Per Product for WC link
  3. Click “Install Now”
  4. Finally click “Activate Plugin & Run Plugin”

If you would prefer to do things manually then follow these instructions:

  1. Upload the custom-thank-you-page-wc folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the Products -> Edit Any Product, and use it.

short_description: Free WC extension that enable to assign custom thank you page to any product specifically.
description: Free WC extension that enable to assign custom thank you page to any product specifically you also can link to other WordPress pages and even a custom link or URL.
